mapper.select: SELECT TQ.ID AS QNA_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_TIME, QNA_IMG_NAME, QNA_IMG_PATH, QNA_CATEGORY, QNA_ANSWER_TITLE, QNA_ANSWER_CONTENT, QNA_ANSWER_TIME FROM TBL_USER TU JOIN TBL_QNA TQ ON TU.ID = TQ.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_QNA_ANSWER TQA ON TQA.QNA_ID = TQ.ID WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} ORDER BY QNA_TIME

SELECT TQ.ID AS QNA_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_TIME, QNA_IMG_NAME, QNA_IMG_PATH, QNA_CATEGORY, QNA_ANSWER_TITLE, QNA_ANSWER_CONTENT, QNA_ANSWER_TIME FROM TBL_USER TU JOIN TBL_QNA TQ ON TU.ID = TQ.USER_ID FULL OUTER JOIN TBL_QNA_ANSWER TQA ON TQA.QNA_ID = TQ.ID WHERE TQ.ID = #{qnaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_QNA (ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_TIME, QNA_IMG_NAME, QNA_IMG_PATH, QNA_CATEGORY, USER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_QNA.NEXTVAL, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{qnaImgName}, #{qnaImgPath}, #{qnaCategory}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBQ.ID AS QNA_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_TIME, QNA_IMG_NAME, QNA_IMG_PATH, QNA_CATEGORY, QNA_ANSWER_TITLE, QNA_ANSWER_CONTENT, QNA_ANSWER_TIME FROM TBL_QNA TBQ JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBU.ID = TBQ.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_QNA_ANSWER TQA ON TQA.QNA_ID = TBQ.ID ORDER BY QNA_TIME DESC
